attributes.action: Failing Water Companies- enforce mandatory investment, penalties & end dividends
attributes.additional_details: Water is essential. In the UK, supply failures, sewage discharges & failing infrastructure show systemic failure in regulation & operation of water co’s. Not due to bad weather or changes in demand, but yrs of under-investment & weak oversight allowing monopoly providers to prioritise dividends over customers & the env’t. Customers cannot switch supplier & lack protection when services fail. Gov’t must act to protect consumers, restore rivers and coasts, & ensure reliable, sustainable services.
attributes.background:
Ensure water companies maintain, repair, & future‑proof water infrastructure before paying dividends or raising bills.
Insist % of WC revenue spent on supply resilience.
Ban dividends & bonuses unless standards are met
Impose penalties for failure
Automatic compensation
Restore all UK waters
